home.description: Search for Pokémon by name or by national pokédex number.
home.searchPlaceholder: What pokémon are you looking for ?

filters.description: Use advanced search to explore Pokémon by type and form.

about.noFlavor: This Pokémon Doesn't have any Pokédex description.

stats.infos: The ranges shown on the right are for a level 100 Pokémon. Maximum values are based on a beneficial nature, 252 EVs, 31 IVs; minimum values are based on a hindering nature, 0 EVs, 0 IVs.

types.infos: The effectiveness of each type on

language.interfaceDescription:
English (EN)

The interface of the application (buttons and menus) will be displayed in this language.
language.dataDescription: Pokémon names, abilities, moves, etc. will be displayed in this language.

credits.nintendo: The name of the characters, their artwork, the theme "Pokémon ®" and their brands are the properties of © Nintendo, The Pokémon Company, Game Freak and Creatures Inc.
credits.bulbapedia: Most of the data of the Pokédex are from Bulbapedia.
credits.pokepedia: Some french translations of the data of the Pokédex are from Poképedia.
credits.flavioFarias: The design of the application is based on the one created by Flavio Farias.

links.githubDescription: View the app's source code and contribute to it by creating issues or pull requests.
links.patreonDescription: Support financially the app and gain access to early access and other perks.
